title: Ranked solo Que
body:
Of my last 10 ranked games. 7 have had one or more people DC for an entire game.
Not to mention intentional feeding....
How is this fair, I've been demoted because of this.

it's actually still 50/50. When you duo you always vs a duo. "Assuming" duos dont AFK from their partner. <3 dont get technical fgt

From my experience, ever since patch 5.4 was installed, the number of people disconnecting in games has risen sharply. Most come back, some lag all throughout the game and intermittently disconnect, and some just never return. Something to do with the code since 5.4 ?
It could be the reason. Even though you guys talk about this 44/56 business, what about having feeders and afkers in consecutive games? That's possible.

Assuming one AFK/DC/feeder in every game (which is highly unlikely at most) and assuming my calculations are correct:
44% chance for a single person AFK/DC/feeder on your team for one game.
19.36% chance for a single person AFK/DC/feeder on your team for two games.
8.52% (rounded up to two decimal places) chance for a single person AFK/DC/feeder on your team for three games.
3.75% (rounded up to two decimal places) chance for a single person AFK/DC/feeder on your team for four games.
1.65% (rounded up to two decimal places) chance for a single person AFK/DC/feeder on your team for five games.

I'll admit it's possible but it's certainly not a determining factor in regards to demotions. Sure you can have multiple AFK/DC/feeder in one game but that's still only one game, it's not going to have much more of an impact if you had four AFK/DC/feeder compared to just one.
Yes, it's completely your teams fault and has nothing to do with your terrible gameplay and mechanics...
